name: Ore Stash
description: This module is a simple 1928 ore crate module to store ore, with a resource bridge at the center on each side. It has a valid ship frame so it can be used in a station or capital ship hangar (minimum 16x16x16 including corners) to expand its storage.
shortDescription: This module is a simple 1928 ore crate module to store ore, with a resource bridge at the center on each side. It has a valid ship frame so it can be used in a station or capital ship hangar (minimum 16x16x16 including corners) to expand its storage.
